element.name: rpbody
element.sql: SELECT tt.id, tt.start_date, tt.lastDate, (SELECT os.name FROM order_state os WHERE os.id = tt.lastState) lastsate, tt.delay, ROUND(tt.delay / 24, 1) daydelay, tt.alias FROM (SELECT t.id, t.alias, t.start_date, MAX(IFNULL(t.state_date, t.start_date)) lastdate, MAX(t.state) lastState, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, t.start_date, NOW()) delay FROM (SELECT oes.id, oes.sub_id, oes.state, oes.start_date, oes.state_date, pg.alias FROM order_extra_state oes INNER JOIN print_group pg ON pg.order_id = oes.id AND pg.sub_id = oes.sub_id AND pg.book_type > 0 WHERE oes.state BETWEEN 200 AND 455 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM order_extra_state oes1 WHERE oes.id = oes1.id AND oes.sub_id = oes1.sub_id AND oes1.state_date IS NOT NULL AND oes1.state = 450) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM orders o WHERE o.id = oes.id AND o.state BETWEEN 200 AND 500) ORDER BY oes.start_date ASC) t GROUP BY t.id, t.alias -- , t.sub_id ORDER BY t.start_date ASC) tt
